channel.title: Armour Glitch
channel.description: Does anyone know why some armour or items to wear eg. diving apparatus and rune claws get weilded in weapon spot instead of cape spot/sheild spot? this is p[robably just somehting small but im new and not sure aobut it so if anyone knows help would be greatly appreciated =]

item.title: Armour Glitch
item.dc:creator: @jensie jensie
item.description:
@jensie wrote:

[quote=“legend rene, post:17, topic:121672”]I own stfu , yar was right , the files are declared in server.java and are all case sensitive and the one with no life , try using google >> www.google.com

[/quote] I’m sure you can find some on ebay.com too …
You can easily change the slot, but if you flame like that, you don’t need to expect people will help you…
